name: Fire&Shrines
description:
This Game was made for the GoGodot Jam2 which was conducted by Redifine, Jade and Lucy  to raise awareness and community about an efficient game engine : Godot[u should try it]
Godotengine
Gogodotsite
The Gogodot community is great and we had a Blast participating in the jam
We really appericiate the work they are putting up! We also thank the streamers who put up great content during the jam..

 Our Game:
 You are a ninja! U are a warrior of fire staying in frozen ice sucks!
#WASD to move 
Dont let your energy run out !
Gain energy by moving near the fire..
Beaware  Of spikes and traps
Get to the shrine go to the next level
Gameengine used: GODOT
